issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: Could I take this simple task?
I think you can assign yourself and provide a patch.
I can't because I'm still not in the approved list for yarn
Please check it now, I added you to the contributor list.

Thanks [~aaperezl]

A minor nit.
Instead of {{Check if a resource does not provide memory or virtual cores.}}, I think you can mention like {{Check whether a resource object is empty. (0 memory and 0 virtual cores)}} something like this. Because *does not provide memory or virtual cores* may not be correct.
I have corrected the wording as suggested
